item.title: Delete
item.dc:creator: @ThatOneServer Mike_
item.description:
@ThatOneServer wrote:

i was fucked up when i posted this I think. I don’t remember ever coming into the c++ section

[code]#include
#include
#include
using namespace std;

int main ()
{
string line;
int Amount =0;
int Parts = 0;
int times=0;
cout << “How many times would you like the loop to run: “;
getline (cin, line);
stringstream(line) >> Amount;
cout << “How many parts should each loop have: “;
getline (cin, line);
stringstream(line) >> Parts;
for(int i=1;i <= Amount;i++) {
for(int b=1;b <= Parts; b++) {
times++;
cout<<“The loop has ran “<<i<<” and “<<b<<”/”<<Parts<<” times! (#”<<times<<”)\n”;
}
}
cout<<“The loop is finished!\n”;
system(“pause”);
return 0;
}
[/code]

Output(Red = input):

How many times would you like the loop to run: 10 How many parts should each loop have: 3 The loop has ran 1 and 1/3 times! (#1) The loop has ran 1 and 2/3 times! (#2) The loop has ran 1 and 3/3 times! (#3) The loop has ran 2 and 1/3 times! (#4) The loop has ran 2 and 2/3 times! (#5) The loop has ran 2 and 3/3 times! (#6) The loop has ran 3 and 1/3 times! (#7) The loop has ran 3 and 2/3 times! (#8) The loop has ran 3 and 3/3 times! (#9) The loop has ran 4 and 1/3 times! (#10) The loop has ran 4 and 2/3 times! (#11) The loop has ran 4 and 3/3 times! (#12) The loop has ran 5 and 1/3 times! (#13) The loop has ran 5 and 2/3 times! (#14) The loop has ran 5 and 3/3 times! (#15) The loop has ran 6 and 1/3 times! (#16) The loop has ran 6 and 2/3 times! (#17) The loop has ran 6 and 3/3 times! (#18) The loop has ran 7 and 1/3 times! (#19) The loop has ran 7 and 2/3 times! (#20) The loop has ran 7 and 3/3 times! (#21) The loop has ran 8 and 1/3 times! (#22) The loop has ran 8 and 2/3 times! (#23) The loop has ran 8 and 3/3 times! (#24) The loop has ran 9 and 1/3 times! (#25) The loop has ran 9 and 2/3 times! (#26) The loop has ran 9 and 3/3 times! (#27) The loop has ran 10 and 1/3 times! (#28) The loop has ran 10 and 2/3 times! (#29) The loop has ran 10 and 3/3 times! (#30) The loop is finished! Press any key to continue . . .
